location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX MAP OF GAZETTEER AND ROUTES IN PERSIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 215 x 283mm, on sheet 263 x 345mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the whole of Persia with portions of adjacent countries, and indicates the extents of the coverage of each volume of the Gazetteer and Routes of Persia, administrative regions and boundaries, hydrology, and major cities and towns.The map was printed at the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads, 'S.D.O. No. 1756, Jan. 1917.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
